Lunar Limit

by Pubby

Released Jan 1, 2017
Players 1
Tags platformer
License MIT

Download ROM (sha-1: 931f1adc6fc8d9a3ff01544349e3a06d15ac5760)

Description

An early 80s arcade shooter for the NES. Play it on an emulator or NES hardware! Lunar Limit puts you in control of a miniature version of planet earth, "Mini Earth", and your faithful satellite, "The Moon Cannon", in an all-out-war against evil Atari invaders.

Screenshots
